lead_paragraph: Kenenisa Bekele of Ethiopia set a world record for two miles at the Norwich Union Grand Prix in Birmingham, England. He was timed in 8:04.35. Bekele beat the record by 0.34 seconds. Kenya’s Haile Gebrselassie set the old mark of 8:04.69 in 2003.
